entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with flurries. Flurries near the British Columbia border this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
